title: Jaat director Gopichand confirms his next film with Balakrishna
summary: Malayalam sports drama Alappuzha Gymkhana, starring Premalu fame Naslen, is set for Telugu release on April 25, 2025. The film, directed by Khalid Rahman, was originally released in Malayalam on April 10 and received positive response for its content-driven storytelling.
content:
After gaining popularity among Telugu audiences with Premalu, actor Naslen is all set to return with another film – this time in a sports drama titled Alappuzha Gymkhana. Directed by Khalid Rahman, the Malayalam film is now gearing up for its Telugu release on April 25, 2025.

Alappuzha Gymkhana was originally released in Malayalam on April 10, 2025, and received a positive response for its content-driven storytelling and refreshing take on the sports genre. The film has been holding steady at the box office and is now aiming to make a mark with Telugu audiences.

Alongside Naslen, the film features a talented ensemble cast including Lukman Avaran, Ganapathi S. Poduval, Sandeep Pradeep, Anagha Ravi, Franco Francis, Baby Jean, and Shiva Hariharan. Produced by Plan B Motion Pictures and Reelistic Studios, the film's music is composed by Vishnu Vijay.

source.title: Jaat director Gopichand confirms his next film with Balakrishna – More details inside

Alappuzha Gymkhana was originally released in Malayalam on April 10, 2025, and received a positive response for its content-driven storytelling and refreshing take on the sports genre. The film has been holding steady at the box office and is now aiming to make a mark with Telugu audiences.

Alongside Naslen, the film features a talented ensemble cast including Lukman Avaran, Ganapathi S. Poduval, Sandeep Pradeep, Anagha Ravi, Franco Francis, Baby Jean, and Shiva Hariharan. Produced by Plan B Motion Pictures and Reelistic Studios, the film’s music is composed by Vishnu Vijay.

content.title: Premalu Star Naslen’s sports drama Alappuzha Gymkhana set for Telugu release
content.author: 123telugu

markdown_content:
## Release Details
Naslen, who gained popularity among Telugu audiences with *Premalu*, is all set to return with another film – this time in a sports drama titled *Alappuzha Gymkhana*. Directed by Khalid Rahman, the Malayalam film is now gearing up for its Telugu release on April 25, 2025.

## Reception
*Alappuzha Gymkhana* was originally released in Malayalam on April 10, 2025, and received a positive response for its content-driven storytelling and refreshing take on the sports genre. The film has been holding steady at the box office and is now aiming to make a mark with Telugu audiences.

## Cast and Crew
The film features a talented ensemble cast including:
- Naslen
- Lukman Avaran
- Ganapathi S. Poduval
- Sandeep Pradeep
- Anagha Ravi
- Franco Francis
- Baby Jean
- Shiva Hariharan

The film is produced by Plan B Motion Pictures and Reelistic Studios, with music composed by Vishnu Vijay.
